usageRules.title: Usage Rules

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How to create a discount coupon?
faq.a1: To create a coupon, access your personal area, go to the "Referrals" section and click "Generate Coupon". The system will automatically create a coupon with 10% discount valid for 2 years.
faq.q2: Can I create more than one coupon?
faq.a2: No, each user can have only one active coupon at a time. To create a new coupon, contact our support.
faq.q3: What happens when the coupon expires?
faq.a3: Expired coupons can no longer be used. Contact support to request renewal of your coupon.
faq.q4: How to track my coupon usage?
faq.a4: In your coupons area, you can see how many times your coupon has been used and how many uses remain from the maximum limit.

section1.title: 1. About Account Deactivation
section1.p1: {company} respects users' right to request deactivation of their accounts and personal data, in compliance with the {law} and other applicable legislation.
section1.p2: This document explains how the account deactivation process works, what data is affected and the timelines involved.

section2.title: 2. How to Request Deactivation
section2.intro: To request deactivation of your account, you can:
section2.step1: Access the {settings} page in your account
section2.step4: Confirm your request in the confirmation dialog
section2.alternative: Alternatively, you can send a request by email to {email} with the subject "Account Deactivation Request".

section3.title: 3. Deactivation Process
section3.intro: After receiving your request, we follow the following process:
section3.stage1Desc: We verify the requester's identity and validate the request to ensure account security.
section3.stage2Desc: Your account will be deactivated, but data will remain stored for 30 days. During this period, you can cancel the request and reactivate your account.
section3.stage3Desc: After the grace period, your profile will be permanently deactivated from our systems.

section4.title: 4. Data That Will Be Affected
section4.intro: Account deactivation will result in blocking access to the following data:

section5.title: 5. Data That Will Be Retained
section5.intro: For legal, regulatory or security reasons, some data may be retained for specific periods:
section5.item1: Financial transaction records (according to tax legislation)
section5.item3: Data necessary to comply with legal obligations
section5.item4: Aggregated and statistical information (without personal identification)
section5.footer: This data is retained only for the necessary time and in compliance with applicable laws.

section6.title: 6. Download Your Data
section6.intro: Before permanent deactivation, you have the right to request a copy of your personal data:
section6.item1: Request download during the 30-day grace period
section6.item2: Data will be provided in structured and readable format
section6.item3: Download will be available for 7 days after request

section7.title: 7. Canceling the Request
section7.intro: During the 30-day grace period, you can cancel the deactivation request:
section7.item1: Log in to your account (if still within the grace period)
section7.item3: Your account will be reactivated within 24 hours
section7.item4: All data will be restored to the previous state

section8.title: 8. Consequences of Deactivation
section8.intro: Account deactivation is irreversible after the grace period. Consequences include:
section8.item1: Blocking access to all health and fitness data
section8.item4: Loss of access to previous medical consultations
section8.item5: Need to reactivate account to use the service again

section9.title: 9. Questions and Support
section9.intro: For questions about the account deactivation process or to request support:
section9.footer: Our team is ready to clarify any questions about the deactivation process and your rights as a user.

centralAjuda.title: FitCertify365 Help Center
centralAjuda.subtitle: Find answers to your questions and contact us

faq.q1: Is the certificate valid for all races?
faq.a1: Yes. The physical fitness certificate issued by FitCertify365 is valid for any competition that requires proof of health, according to the guidelines of sports and medical authorities. We only recommend checking if the event organization accepts digital certificates.
faq.q2: Do I need to take exams beforehand?
faq.a2: It depends. Some users already have recent exams and don't need to repeat them. Others may be advised to perform complementary exams, according to the analysis of the responsible health professional. FitCertify365 connects you to doctors who will follow clinical criteria to ensure your safety.
faq.a3: All certificates are signed by doctors registered with the Regional Council of Medicine (CRM), with experience in sports health and physical fitness. The platform guarantees verification and digital registration of the signature for its validity.
faq.q4: How do I know if it's valid?
faq.a4: The certificate has digital authentication, unique identification number and online validation through QR Code. Any organizer or authorized third party can verify authenticity in seconds by accessing the link indicated in the document.
faq.a5: The process is fast. The doctor performs the exams with you at the office and, if everything is correct, the certificate is issued on the spot, digitally and with valid authentication throughout the national territory.
faq.q6: Can I use the same one for multiple races?
faq.a6: Yes. The certificate can be used in several races, as long as it is within the validity period defined by the doctor (usually between 3 and 12 months). Just present it to the organizers when requested.

politicaPrivacidade.title: Privacy Policy, Terms and Conditions of Use and Data Protection

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.termsIntro: These Terms of Service ("Terms", "Terms of Service", "Terms and Conditions of Use") govern the use of our mobile applications and digital platform, developed by FitCertify365.
section1.privacyPolicyText: also governs the use of our Service and explains how we collect, protect and disclose information resulting from your use of mobile applications and web pages.
section1.agreement: Your agreement with us includes these Terms and our Privacy Policy ("Agreements"). By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood the Agreements, and agree to be legally bound by them.
section1.disagree: If you do not agree (or cannot comply) with the Agreements, you may not use the Service. In this case, we request that you contact us by email
section1.disagreeEnd: so we can find a solution.
section1.applies: These Terms apply to all visitors, users and other persons who wish to access or use the Service.
section1.integrationText: , for reading and monitoring data obtained via Apple Watch and other compatible wearable devices, also allowing the sending of manual data and Bluetooth (BLE) devices, always with user authorization.

section2.title: 2. Communications
section2.text: By using our services, you agree to receive newsletters, marketing or promotional materials and other information we may send. However, you may opt out of receiving such communications by following the unsubscribe link included in the messages or by sending an email to

section3.title: 3. Content
section3.intro: Our Service allows you to post, store, share and make available information, text, graphics, videos or other materials ("Content"). You are responsible for the Content you post on or through the Service, including its legality, reliability and appropriateness.
section3.declaration: By posting Content, you represent and warrant that:
section3.item1: The Content is your property and/or you have the rights to use it and grant FitCertify365 the rights to use as provided in these Terms.
section3.item2: The posting of Content does not violate privacy rights, image rights, copyrights, contracts or any other third party rights.
section3.rights: You retain all rights to the Content submitted, posted or displayed, but grant FitCertify365 a worldwide, free and non-exclusive license to use, modify, reproduce, distribute, display and share such Content through the Service.
section3.ownership: Content found on the Service is owned by FitCertify365 or used with authorization. Distribution, modification, transmission, reuse, copying or use for commercial purposes without express written authorization is prohibited.

section4.title: 4. Health Data and Medical Records
section4.text: Our Service allows the storage of personal health data and records collected from health, fitness and wellness devices and applications. You are responsible for the Content and Data you send and store on the Service.

section5.title: 5. Prohibited Uses
section5.intro: You agree to use the Service only for lawful purposes, and may not:
section5.item1: Violate applicable national or international laws.
section5.item3: Send spam, chain letters, unsolicited messages.
section5.item4: Use false identity or impersonate third parties.
section5.item5: Introduce viruses, malware or harmful materials.
section5.item6: Interfere with the operation of the Service or attempt to access restricted areas.

section6.title: 6. Analytics and Monitoring
section6.text: We may use third-party service providers to monitor and analyze the use of the platform.

section7.title: 7. Minimum Age
section7.text: The Service is intended only for persons over 18 years of age. By using it, you declare that you have full legal capacity to accept these Terms.

section8.title: 8. Accounts
section8.text: When creating an account, you agree to provide true, complete and updated information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your login and password, as well as for all activities performed under your account.

section9.title: 9. Account and Data Deletion
section9.intro: You may request the deletion of your account and personal data stored by FitCertify365, in accordance with
section9.process: After approval of the request, your account will be deactivated and you will have 30 days to download your data before permanent deletion.

section10.title: 10. Intellectual Property
section10.text: The Service, its design, functionalities and contents (except User Content) remain the exclusive property of FitCertify365 and its licensors, being protected by copyrights and other legislation.

section11.title: 11. Copyright
section11.text: We respect copyrights and will respond to any infringement notification sent to the email

section12.title: 12. Limitation of Liability
section12.text: Except where prohibited by law, FitCertify365 will not be liable for indirect, incidental or consequential damages arising from the use of the Service.

section13.title: 13. Account Termination
section13.text: We may suspend or terminate your account immediately, without prior notice, if you violate these Terms.

section14.title: 14. Applicable Law
section14.text: These Terms will be governed by Brazilian laws, also respecting international legislation applicable to data protection (such as GDPR, HIPAA and LGPD when applicable).

section15.title: 15. Changes
section15.text: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of the platform after publication of changes will imply acceptance of the new Terms.

section16.title: 16. Acknowledgment
section16.text: BY USING THE SERVICE, YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU HAVE READ AND AGREE TO THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF USE.

documentos.noDocumentsDescription: There are no documents available at the moment

preRaceHealthCheck.title: Pre-Race Health Check-in
preRaceHealthCheck.subtitle: Answer the questions below to assist the medical team. All fields are optional.
preRaceHealthCheck.successMessage: Your form has been submitted successfully.

questions.dor_peito: Have you experienced chest pain or pressure, palpitations, or unusual shortness of breath in the last 48 hours?
questions.febre: Have you had a fever or chills in the last 24 hours?
questions.horas_sono: How many hours of sleep did you get last night?
questions.termogenico: Have you consumed any thermogenic supplement, pre-workout, or stimulant in the last 12 hours?
questions.tontura: Have you experienced dizziness, visual darkening, or fainting in the last two days?
questions.analgesico: Have you taken any anti-inflammatory or painkiller in the last 6 hours?
questions.viagem: Have you taken a long trip or experienced a sudden altitude change in the last week?
questions.dor_muscular: Do you feel any joint or muscle pain that forces you to limp or change your running form?
questions.estado_mental: Do you feel mentally alert and oriented at the moment?
questions.nausea: Have you had any episode of vomiting or persistent nausea in the last 12 hours?

justifications.dor_peito: Identifies acute cardiac warning signs that may progress to serious events during intense effort.
justifications.febre: Fever compromises thermal regulation and increases the risk of viral myocarditis, one of the main causes of sudden death in athletes.
justifications.horas_sono: Sleep deprivation reduces heat dissipation capacity and impairs motor coordination, increasing the risk of complications.
justifications.termogenico: These substances can dangerously elevate heart rate and blood pressure, as well as mask signs of exhaustion.
justifications.tontura: Indicates circulatory instability or metabolic imbalances that may lead to collapse during the race.
justifications.analgesico: Using these medications before intense effort increases the risk of acute kidney injury, especially in dehydration contexts.
justifications.viagem: Jet lag and lack of acclimatization alter cardiovascular response and the athlete's hydration status.
justifications.dor_muscular: Biomechanical compensations significantly increase the risk of acute orthopedic injuries during the race.
justifications.estado_mental: Changes in mental clarity may indicate electrolyte imbalance, dehydration, or severe systemic stress.
justifications.nausea: Vomiting and nausea indicate prior dehydration and electrolyte loss, compromising muscle and cardiovascular function.
